items.label: Passport or National ID
items.description: Ensure it is valid for at least 6 months.

items.label: Proof of Address
items.description: Utility bill, rental contract, or 'Annex' document from the commune.

items.label: Tax Identification Number (TIN)
items.description: From your home country (required for tax reporting).

items.label: Install Payconiq by Bancontact
items.description: Link it to your new account once active.
